attributes.action: Reinstate the third verse of the Official Peace Version of God Save The Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
God Save the Queen is typically sung as one verse. However the Official Peace Version, A.D. 1919, contains three verses. We petition the Prime Minister to celebrate the diverse nature and cultural unity of our nation by adding the following verse, and leading its adoption by example by publicly celebrating it at every opportunity:

"Of many a race and birth,
From utmost ends of earth,
God save us all
Bid strife and hatred cease,
Bid hope and joy increase,
Spread universal peace,
God save us all!"

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
